issue.title: Model for left arm is wrong in v4 (and has always been wrong)

content.raw:
Since @tkoolen 's patch was between xacro'd versions of `atlas_v4_simple_shapes.urdf`, I first passed this file through xacro in 2b4d7f6 to get the attributes sorted the same way and whitespace aligned. I then applied his patch in d0fd0d2 and followed it up with another xacro run to clean up any whitespace. So I would look at specific commits rather than a complete branch comparison, which has a lot of noise in it.

How does this look?

I imagine these v4 changes should be propagated to other v4 urdf's, and then we need to address the v5.
